::Hot Rod::

"We could do this all day but no one will get anywhere."
He fired two rockets, four plasma charges, and two optics at Sgarpedge.
The then destroyed the missiles and spinner.

::Demolition::

His head was blown clear off. He went into stasis lock, and internal
repairs kicked in. Not that they could do much for the head.
